Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: An excellent opportunity to lease warehouse space and/or office space in North Richmond. The available 14,801 sq.ft warehouse space features 28 ft. clear ceiling heights and ample room in the loading area. The available 5,713 sq.ft. office space contains a mix of private and open meeting areas with ample natural lighting. The property is conveniently in close proximity to the Knight Street Bridge for fast commute to all areas of Metro Vancouver. Users will also find numerous amenities located within a 10-minute drive benefiting staff.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: WAREHOUSE/OFFICE FOR LEASE | 15100 RIVER ROAD

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This South East facing corner unit is situated at the front of the Complex and is located on Viking Way, just north of Bridgeport. This locaion provides convenient access to the Knight Street Bridge Corridor and Highway 91/99. Accessible via 405 & 407 bus line, departing every 20 minutes.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: OFFICE SPACE FOR LEASE | 2639 VIKING WAY UNIT 210

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: High exposure corner suite on Viking Way, steps away from rapid transit on Bridgeport Road and with direct access to one of the largest 4 way interchanges in North Richmond. There is also an option to lease either the main or 2nd floor.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SUBLEASE | PRIME EXPOSURE PRIME EXPOSURE 3,471 SF CORNER OFFICE AT KNIGHT/BRIDGEPORT

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 11220 Voyageur Way is located by the intersection of Bridgeport Road and Shell Road, offering easy connection to all parts of the Lower Mainland including Vancouver, Burnaby, and New Westminster. Richmond Centre is a 10-minute drive away, Vancouver International Airport is 15-minute drive away, and Downtown Vancouver is a 25-minute drive away. The location is also serviced by multiple bus routes that depart from SkyTrain stations including the 407 and 430.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The subject property sits in the heart of Riverside Industrial Park in South Richmond. This highly convenient location is situated seconds away from the intersection of Steveston Highway and Highway 99 to Vancouver and the U.S border crossing. Occupants will enjoy convenient access to public transit routes along No. 5 Road and Steveston Highway that connect directly to downtown Richmond and the Canada Line SkyTrain. Occupants will also benefit from the nearby Ironwood Plaza with over 35 unique retail stores, restaurants, banking and other services. With the upcoming George Massey Tunnel Replacement Project due to be completed in 2022, Riverside Industrial Park properties will undergo a major transformation as daily traffic is forecasted to exceed 80,000 users daily after completion.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | OFFICE AND WAREHOUSE UNITS AVAILABLE

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Richmond Town Centre

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: A master planned community located at the gateway to downtown Richmond with 5 residential towers serviced by over 60,000 SF of retail space and one stand alone office tower featuring over 134,000 SF of first class office space. The office building is located directly across the street from the Lansdowne SkyTrain station, with great exposure to No. 3 Road. This town centre location provides quick and easy access to Downtown Vancouver, YVR and with the convenience of all the amenities offered in Richmonds town centre.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Brighouse West Business Park is a 750,000 square foot office and industrial park comprised of 18 single and
multi-tenant buildings. Brighouse West is conveniently located on the corner of No. 2 Road and Westminster
Highway, minutes from the Vancouver International Airport, major traffic arteries and the No. 3 Road SkyTrain
station. Brighouse West is a secure, professionally managed commercial park that is home to a number of
national and international tenants.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | #201 - 6551 WESTMINSTER HIGHWAY

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Brighouse West Business Park is a 750,000 square foot office and industrial park comprised of 18 single and
multi-tenant buildings. Brighouse West is conveniently located on the corner of No. 2 Road and Westminster
Highway, minutes from the Vancouver International Airport, major traffic arteries and the No. 3 Road SkyTrain
station. Brighouse West is a secure, professionally managed commercial park that is home to a number of
national and international tenants.
